main_definition: Tanks can refer to military armored vehicles, a method of storage for liquids or substances, or an idiomatic expression indicating lack of enthusiasm or support.

meanings_and_examples.example: During World War II, the British and German forces used tanks in battles on the Eastern Front.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Storage container for liquids or substances
meanings_and_examples.example: I poured gasoline into a tank to fuel my lawnmower.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Idiomatic expression indicating lack of enthusiasm or support
meanings_and_examples.example: When asked about the new policy, he said it was just 'tanks' and didn't express any support.
